original_title: RSC Live: The Merchant of Venice
overview: In the melting pot of Venice, trade is God. With its ships plying the globe, the city opens its arms to all - as long as they come prepared to do business and there is profit to be made.  When the gold is flowing all is well - but when a contract between Bassanio and Shylock is broken, simmering racial tensions boil over.  A wronged father, and despised outsider, Shylock looks to exact the ultimate price for a deal sealed in blood.
title: RSC Live: The Merchant of Venice
